edu.mbhs.madubozhi.touhou.game.bullet

Class Boss

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.mbhs.madubozhi.touhou.game.bullet.Bullet
      • edu.mbhs.madubozhi.touhou.game.bullet.EnemyBullet
        • edu.mbhs.madubozhi.touhou.game.bullet.Boss

  • public class Boss
extends EnemyBullet
    A Boss is an EnemyBullet usually with a special and complex pattern attached to it
    Author:
    bowenzhi

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw(javax.media.opengl.GL gl)
      Draws this Bullet
      void drawNoBind(javax.media.opengl.GL gl)
      Draws this Bullet without binding the texture (for efficiency purposes, it is advantageous to bind the texture once and draw all bullets of that texture

    • Constructor Detail

      • Boss

        public Boss(float velocity,
    java.awt.Dimension hitbox,
    com.sun.opengl.util.texture.Texture sprite,
    java.awt.Dimension spriteSize,
    int hp,
    int scoreValue,
    Spellcard spellcard,
    boolean lockAngle,
    boolean offScreenDelete,
    boolean spinning)
        Instantiates this Boss with the following parameters
        Parameters:
        velocity - Velocity
        hitbox - Size of hitbox
        sprite - Sprite texture to render
        spriteSize - Size of sprite
        hp - HP
        scoreValue - How many points are rewarded for defeating this Boss
        spellcard - Special pattern related to this Boss
        lockAngle - determines whether or not to calculate the angle the bullet is moving in for sprite animations
        offScreenDelete - determines whether or not to auto-delete this bullet once it is offscreen
        spinning - determines whether or not to attach an angular velocity to this bullet

      • Boss

        public Boss(float velocity,
    BulletShape shape,
    java.lang.String c,
    int hp,
    int scoreValue,
    Spellcard spellcard,
    boolean lockAngle,
    boolean offScreenDelete,
    boolean spinning)
        Instantiates this Boss with the following parameters
        Parameters:
        velocity - Velocity
        shape - Standard BulletShape
        c - Color of the Bullet
        hp - HP
        scoreValue - How many points are rewarded for defeating this Boss
        spellcard - Special pattern related to this Boss
        lockAngle - determines whether or not to calculate the angle the bullet is moving in for sprite animations
        offScreenDelete - determines whether or not to auto-delete this bullet once it is offscreen
        spinning - determines whether or not to attach an angular velocity to this bullet
